a-na {LU₂}IGI.DUB be-li₂-ia₂ ARAD-ka {1}aš-šur-re-ṣu-u-a lu DI-mu a-na be-li₂-ia₂ {LU₂}A-KIN {LU₂}A-KIN ša {KUR}u₂-ka-a.a ša a-na {KUR}URI e-lu-u-ni a-na KUR-aš-šur{KI} i-tu-ri-di TA@v ŠA₃ KUR-aš-šur{KI} ina KUR {LU₂}SIPA GAL e-te-ti-iq ina {URU}mu-ṣa-ṣir x+x+x+x x x x a-bi-te an-ni-te be-li₂ lu u₂-da mi-i-nu ša ši-ti-ni ša ŠA₃ e-gir₂-te an-ni-te ina E₂.GAL la-aš₂-pur di-ib-bi an-nu-te ku-un-nu-te šu-nu UGU be-li₂-ia₂ a-sap-ra
